last_episode_to_air.name: Memoir (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sheldon leaves East Texas for the California Institute of Technology following the death of his father.

name: Young Sheldon
overview: The early life of child genius Sheldon Cooper, later seen in The Big Bang Theory.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A brilliant yet awkward nine-year-old Sheldon Cooper lands in high school where his smarts leave everyone stumped in this "The Big Bang Theory" spinoff.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Life as a child genius continues to present more brain games for Sheldon as he tackles ambitious projects, social dilemmas and family crises.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Sheldon must find new ways to stay academically challenged as he lands in an internet war, curbs an unhealthy obsession and prepares for the future.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: With high school in the rearview, Sheldon mentally prepares for college as an 11-year-old while the Cooper family deals with issues of their own.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: As tween Sheldon settles into his first year of college, the Coopers face relationship struggles — and a family secret is revealed.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: Sheldon takes on a new role as a dorm resident advisor at college, while his family back home experiences significant changes, including Meemaw and Dale making a potentially risky business deal and Mary and George Sr. rekindling their romance, leading to a season filled with both academic challenges for Sheldon and family dynamics navigating new situations.

seasons.name: Season 7
seasons.overview: Season 7 of Young Sheldon follows the Cooper family as they deal with loss, tragedy and new beginnings.

tagline: It all started with a big bang—or rather, in East Texas.
